@NonNullByDefault

Package com.linecorp.armeria.spring

Spring Boot integration.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ArmeriaServerConfigurator
    Interface used to configure a service on the default armeria server.
    MeterIdPrefixFunctionFactory
    Produces a MeterIdPrefixFunction from a service name.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractServiceRegistrationBean<T,​U>
    An abstract bean with information for registering a service object.
    AnnotatedServiceRegistrationBean
    A bean with information for registering an annotated service object.
    ArmeriaAutoConfiguration  
    ArmeriaSettings
    Settings for armeria servers, e.g.,
    ArmeriaSettings.Compression
    Configurations for the HTTP content encoding.
    ArmeriaSettings.Port
    Port and protocol settings.
    ArmeriaSpringBoot1MeterBindersConfiguration
    Provides useful MeterBinders.
    HttpServiceRegistrationBean
    A bean with information for registering a http service.
    Ssl
    Simple server-independent abstraction for SSL configuration.
    ThriftServiceRegistrationBean
    A bean with information for registering a thrift service.
